text: Das Kapital is a written work created by philosopher Karl Marx first published on 14 September 1867 explaining capitalism and its issues such as values, commodity fetishism, exploitation and colonization. == Related pages == *The Communist Manifesto "Archived copy". Archived from the original on 6 July 2013. Retrieved 19 May 2017. Category:Marxism Category:Economics books
title: Das Kapital
